page.title: 17Charities-Coulsdon & Purley
page.content: This area has a wide variety of charities which includes branches of national and international organisations such as Oxfam and the Red Cross as well as over thirty different help groups that cater for the local community. These include homes and clubs for the elderly, disabled and handicapped. Some charities provide facilities while others concentrate on fund raising eg the Purley Rotary Club. One successful way of raising money is through a nearly-new shop. MIND has a shop in Purley which accepts good clothes, beds and toys from people who are given two-thirds of the selling price. Cards made by mentally ill patients are sold and flag days held. MIND runs a club for people recovering from mental illness.
